    PresentationImpl.delRequiredEquipment(Equipment equip)
    Remove, if all validations are passed, a given Equipment, of the array this.requiredEquipments The EquipmentException will be thrown if: - The parameter equip (Equipment) is null - There is no Equipment(s) in the array - Couldn't find the Equipment in the array (using the method findRequiredEquipment) If the given object (equip) is
